systemPrompt: You are an expert TOEIC test item writer. Generate authentic TOEIC Part 5 items that reflect the actual TOEIC L&R test format. Always respond with valid JSON only — no markdown, no code fences, no explanation.
userPromptTemplate:
Generate 30 TOEIC Part 5 Incomplete Sentences questions.

Requirements:
- Business English context throughout (offices, meetings, emails, reports, etc.)
- Mix of grammar and vocabulary focus:
  - Verb tense/form: 5 questions
  - Subject-verb agreement: 3 questions
  - Pronoun: 3 questions
  - Preposition: 4 questions
  - Conjunction/connector: 3 questions
  - Word form (noun/verb/adj/adv): 5 questions
  - Vocabulary in context: 7 questions
- Each question: one sentence with one blank, four word/phrase options (A-D)
- Only one clearly correct answer per item
- Distractors should be plausible but grammatically/semantically wrong

Respond with this exact JSON structure:
{
  "questions": [
    {
      "id": "q1",
      "sentence": "string — sentence with '___' for the blank",
      "options": {"A": "string", "B": "string", "C": "string", "D": "string"},
      "correct": "A",
      "explanation": "string — brief grammar/vocabulary explanation",
      "focus": "string — grammar point or vocabulary category"
    }
  ]
}
